Articles.Content:
so i cant make a campaign i just got the game installed it and got into the launcher without a hassle but i cant choose a difficulty and when i press "START CAMPAIGN" nothing happens...

ive tried restarting pc, verifying game files, reinstalling ksp2, updating drivers ex ex. 

update i managed to resolve this issue 

pc specs: Windows 11 Home , 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-11300H @ 3.10GHz   3.11 GHz,        16gGB of RAM,  NIVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050

Edited March 9, 2023 by MixarN

The issue dosent solved till now for me even after updating the game,  the game crashed and closed on loading screen after creatingnew campaign.

Unfortunately Can't play it .

Any one can advice ?

Or solve this problem after the first patch ?
